success.candidateStatusUpdated: Candidate {status} successfully and notification email sent

accepted.subject: Congratulations! Your application for {jobTitle} at {companyName}
accepted.body:
Dear {candidateName},

We are pleased to inform you that your application for the position of {jobTitle} at {companyName} has been accepted. We were impressed with your qualifications and experience, and we believe you would be a valuable addition to our team.

Next Steps:
1. Please reply to this email to confirm your continued interest
2. We will schedule an interview at a time convenient for you
3. During the interview, we will discuss the role in detail, including compensation and benefits

If you have any immediate questions, please reply directly to this email.

We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Best regards,
Recruitment Team
{companyName}
{companyEmail}

rejected.subject: Update on your {jobTitle} application at {companyName}
rejected.body:
Dear {candidateName},

Thank you for your interest in the {jobTitle} position at {companyName} and for taking the time to go through our application process.

After careful consideration of all applications, we regret to inform you that we have decided to move forward with other candidates whose qualifications more closely match our current requirements.

Please note that this decision does not reflect on your capabilities, and we encourage you to apply for other positions that match your skills and experience in the future.

We will keep your application on file for any suitable future positions.

We wish you the best in your job search and professional endeavors.

Best regards,
Recruitment Team
{companyName}
{companyEmail}

notes.templateDescription: The template follows the same format as the question form, with these fields:
notes.areaDescription: The specific area within the discipline (e.g., "AP", "CASH FLOW")
notes.correctAnswerDescription: The letter of the correct answer (A, B, C, or D)
notes.timingDescription: Time in minutes as a number (e.g., 2)
notes.timingWarning: The Timing field must be a numeric value only (e.g., 2, not "2 min").
notes.downloadHelp: You can download the template in either XLSX or CSV format using the buttons above.

AssessmentRules.title: Assessment Rules
AssessmentRules.subtitle: Please read the following rules carefully before starting

identityVerification.title: Continuous Identity Verification
identityVerification.description: Your identity will be continuously verified throughout the assessment using facial recognition technology. Your webcam feed will be monitored in real-time to ensure compliance with assessment rules.

timeLimit.title: Time Limit
timeLimit.description: You have {minutes} minutes and {seconds} seconds to complete {questionCount} questions. The assessment will automatically submit when time expires.

supervision.title: Strict Supervision Requirements
supervision.description: You must remain alone and fully visible to the camera throughout the entire assessment. The system will continuously monitor your presence and identity.
supervision.warning: Your assessment will be terminated if any violations are detected.

prohibitedBehaviors.title: Prohibited Behaviors
prohibitedBehaviors.description: The following actions will result in immediate termination of your assessment:
prohibitedBehaviors.item1: Having another person visible in the camera frame
prohibitedBehaviors.item2: Leaving the camera frame or not being visible
prohibitedBehaviors.item3: Having someone else take the assessment for you

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: You can navigate between questions using the Previous and Next buttons. You can submit your assessment at any time by clicking the Submit button.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.description: By proceeding, you consent to continuous monitoring via your webcam throughout the assessment. The system will record and analyze your session to ensure academic integrity. If the system detects any violations, your assessment will be terminated and your score will be recorded as zero.

technicalRequirements.title: Technical Requirements
technicalRequirements.description: This assessment requires camera access for continuous supervision. Please ensure your camera is enabled, working properly, and that you are in a well-lit environment with your face clearly visible.
